text: Ambush is a 1950 American western movie. Sam Wood directed the movie. The story comes from a serial of the same name by Luke Short. Robert Taylor, Arlene Dahl, John Hodiak, Don Taylor, Jean Hagen, Leon Ames, John McIntire acted in the movie. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer distributed it. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1950 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood
title: Ambush (1950 movie)
